display.title: The name of the contributor as it should appear in general text.

sort.title: The string that should be used for sorting this contributor among others.

key_names.title: The part of the contributor's name most likely to start an ordered list. Surname in Western culture.

names_before_key.title: Parts of the contributor's name that preceed the key_name. This would be first name and/or initials in Western culture.

names_after_key.title: Parts of the contributor's name that follow the key_name. This would be first name in Eastern culture.

titles_before_names.title: Titles which would preceed the contributor's name. eg. Dr., Sir, H.R.H.

prefix_to_key.title: A prefix to the key_name which would not normally be included in the key_name, but which is not part of the before_key_name. eg. 'van' in Ludwig van Beethoven.

suffix_to_key.title: A suffix to the key_name which would not normally be included in the key_name, but which is not part of the after_key_name. eg. 'Jr.' in Sammy Davis Jr.

letters_after_names.title: Honours usually appended after a name. eg. MSci, Ph.D.

media.title: The media types that can be associated with this contributor.

biography.title: A biography associated with this contributor. HTML or plan text.

role.title: A contributor when assocaited with a book may have a role.
